name: Vehicles Jigsaw Puzzles for Toddlers Free
name_original: Vehicles Jigsaw Puzzles for Toddlers Free
description:
Everything in the game is absolutely FREE!

Welcome to the game full of jigsaw puzzles! Let your child explore this fascinating world in a fun and educational way! Both little girls and little boys will enjoy playing this game which includes pictures of various vehicles, animals, food, sights and many more!

Features of the game:
- 15 colorful themes with more than 100 jigsaw puzzles for babies;
- When a puzzle is completed children are rewarded with colorful balloons;
- After each five completed puzzles players get a wonderful present which is placed on the prize shelf;
- Easy navigation between puzzles specially designed for toddlers and preschool children 1 – 4 years old;
- Interactive app encourages child’s development of attention, logic thinking, memory, cognitive skills, fine motor skills, etc.;
- And a pleasant bonus for parents – you don’t have to worry about losing any of the puzzle pieces!

Jigsaw Puzzles is a universal app in educational series which is good for both phones and tablets so that your little ones could practice their skills everywhere and whenever they want: during the road trip, in the line to the dentist or when parent needs to do some house work.

Download the Jigsaw Puzzles for Kids and you little one will forget about boredom!
